# probe_maker
Script that generates probes for enrichment using standard DNA sequences of desired length and overlap.
Based on previous probe makers, it's recommended to pick between 80-120 nt in length. Shorter ones will result in less specific enrichment.
For overlap, it's recommended around 10 nt to ensure no self hybridization.
For example, for an input sequence of 
5'- - 3'

and probes of 100 nt with 10 nt overlap, yeilds:
Position 1: AAGAAAGTATTCCATTCCGGCTCATGGTCCCGGCTAGACCTGCAAGATCGAAGGTACTCAATGACACCAGTGACTGAGCGGTCAGCCCGGAAATAGCCAG
Position 2: AAATAGCCAGAAATGTTACCATCCCCGCATGTTACACAAACGTCGGGCTGACGGAACCCATGAGAACCTATGGTGAATAGACAGTAAACGAGCGCAAAGG
Position 3: AGCGCAAAGGCGTGCTGCCAAGGGCTCCCACCGAATGTAGAACTGATCTGATTTCCGTGACAGGGAAACGCAATGCGAGGTTCCGCAAGTCCACCTATAA
Position 4: CCACCTATAATCTGTGACCGCTCGTAGAACATGGTTAGGGCCTGATTCAGTTAAATCAAGCCACCTCTGACAGAACGACGAGTCAGTGGAATCGACTTCA
Position 5: ATCGACTTCACACCTCAGAGTCCACTCACGTGCTGTAAGTCAAAACCCAGTGAACTTCTCAACCGTGTAGCGCTCCTAGAACATTCAGGCGCCACTGAGG
Position 6: GCCACTGAGGGGCATATGGATGAAGCGTGATACGAATTACCTCCAACGAATGCCAGCTGGGAGGAGGATAGGGACTATGTCTTCGTCAATGCTCCCGTCA
Position 7: GCTCCCGTCAAATGCCTTTCTAAATACCTTTTCGACCTCTCTGTGTGGAATGGGGTCTAGAACCAAGGACTAAAGCGGTGCACGAGGCCCTTTGGATATG
Position 8: TTTGGATATGTCCTTCTTGGGAGGGCCCACAGCCAAAGCCACCCATCACAGCTGGAATCTAATCTTGTGACCCAGTATTAACCGTGAGATCTACACAACC
Position 9: CTACACAACCGACAAGCGCTAGCTTCCTCCCCGGTCAAGTAGTAATGCCGGGATGACTTTGCGTGTCCTATAGCGATCGAGCCCTCGAATTCACGTCGTC
Position 10: TCACGTCGTCAAAGTGGAATGATCAGATTAAAGGGCTGTCGGGAGGGATGTGTAGGCCACTAACACCCCTCTGCACGAACTATAGATACGTCTTTCATCG
Position 11: TCTTTCATCGGTACGCTCGAAAGCGCAGGTGGCTCCCAAATCGTGGGGAGTTAATCGAGCTGCGGATTGGTCCCCACGCCTTACGGCAGCGAACATAATC
Position 12: GAACATAATCCCGCTGATGTGAAGTCGATCTACAAGGTAAACAACGGGGAATATAATTCAGTTGAACCGGTGTGGAGCCTGCACTTGGAACGCTGCATAA

Only re library needed to run script. May add a way later to export it in FastA file in future.
